page.title: 09INDIVIDUAL SPORTS FACILITIES
page.content: Livingston has many sports facilities aside from the Community Schools and Craigswood. A very popular Summer activity is bowls, this is enjoyed by all agegroups and can be played at one of the many "greens" around the town. Often found next to the bowling greens are tennis courts and putting greens. Livingston also has an excellent 18 hole golf course and there is a 9 hole pitch-and-putt under construction. For the less energetic there is the Livingston Snooker Centre which is equiped with 20 full-sized tables. One of the most popular sports for youngsters is BMX-ing. Scores of young people use the BMX track and the Skatepark for racing and practising stunts and tricks.
